## Image

+++

override css

```css
.reveal section img {
  border: 0;
  box-shadow: none;
  margin: 1px;
}
```

```{r setup, echo = FALSE}
knitr::knit_hooks$set(gitpitch = function(before, options, envir) {
  if (before) {
    knit_expand(text = c(stringr::str_glue("+++?image=figure/{opts_current$get('label')}-1.png&position=bottom 5% right 50%&size=60% auto"), "<!--"))
    } else {
    knit_expand(text = "-->")
    }
  })

```

```{r chunk1, gitpitch = TRUE}
plot(1:10)
```
